0.name: The Void
0.description: You don't think that you are not floating in nothing.  You can see a strange portal located above you.

up.description: The Temple of Midgaard floats above you.

1.name: Limbo
1.description: You are floating in a formless void, detached from all sensation of physical matter, surrounded by swirling glowing light, which fades into the relative darkness around you without any trace of edges or shadow.    There is a "No Tipping" notice pinned to the darkness.

3.name: A Totally Empty Room
3.description: The walls are completely bare... nothing at all in the room. How... utterly bizarre and completely weird.  There is a strange portal just above you, and it almost looks as if there is some sort of room above you.

up.description: You notice that the portal above you looks almost like glass, albeit very dirty glass.

1.name: Puff
1.long_desc: Puff the Fractal Dragon is here, contemplating a higher reality.
1.description:
Is that some type of differential curve involving some strange, and
unknown calculus that she seems to be made out of?

10.name: clone
10.long_desc: A boring old clone is standing here.
10.description: This clone is nothing to look at.  No, really, it is quite boring.

11.name: zombie
11.long_desc: A strange humanoid is here.  How odd, its flesh seems to be falling off!
11.description:
This strange humanoid is moving rather slowly, and appears to be
a corpse, a walking corpse!  It must be a zombie or something of
the sort.

19.name: aerial
19.long_desc: An amorphous shape is floating in the air.
19.description:
As you stare at this amorphous shape, it begins to appear to take
the shape of a cloud-like humanoid.

20.name: elemental
20.long_desc: An elemental is standing patiently here.
20.description:
This creature is the essence of the elements, and appears to be
waiting patiently for something to occur.

0.name: bug
0.room_desc: This object is BAD!  If you see it, there must be a bug in the game.  Please

1.name: wings
1.room_desc: A pair of wings is sitting here.

10.name: waybread
10.room_desc: Some waybread has been put here.
